page.title: 05GOLLANFIELD HOUSE
page.content: {Gollanfield house }is over 100 years old.The estate was split up we own the house.We have lived there for about three years.The first time I went inside I got lost because it is so big.At the moment we are spraying the buildings. In the grounds there are many trees including a few pines.There is a scrambling track at the bottom of the eight acre garden.There are a{ {Games hall,tennis court,swimming pool, {porta cabin,lodge }and a{flat}. The swimming pool has been emptied and filled about twice.We have got three dogs; the third one is at my dad's garage.
